subtitle: Choose the leanest duck fillets for this recipe.

method.text: Cook the plums in the sugar and white wine until soft. Puree in a food processor or pass through a fine sieve.
Preheat grill. Season the duck well. Grill the duck for 5 min each side, or until crispy and golden brown.
Meanwhile, to make the plum fans: Cut each plum wedge into four layered V-shaped slices. Put the slices back together, but spread out slightly.
Cut each duck breast into diagonal slices and arrange on warmed serving plates. Spoon over the plum sauce. Serve with a plum fan and a sprig of mint.

title: Duck with plum sauce
